name: .ORI File Extension
summary: Learn about .ORI files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Often added to a file that already has an extension; may be appended to the filename, i.e. "page1.html" may become "page1.html.ori;" often used to differentiate between original and backup (.BAK) files.

content: The ".ori" extension may need to be removed in order for the file to open correctly.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
